channel.description: Recent content in cloud on Calgary RHCE

item.title: InSync Google Drive client in Fedora 30
item.description: After dropbox ended its support for linux clients, I went looking for a different cloud storage solution to sync data between my linux systems. I ended up purchasing 100GB with Google Drive (now Google One) and also purchasing a linux client that would connect to Google Drive and sync data between the cloud and my linux systems.
